original_title: Devolver Digital - Big Fancy Press Conference 2017
overview: Game publisher Devolver Digital's E3 2017 presentation shows off some new games, wrapped in a pastiche and parody of game conference presentations. Featuring chief synergy officer Nina Struthers (Mahria Zook) who presents the Future's Future of Video Games.
title: Devolver Digital - Big Fancy Press Conference 2017
